summary: Completed comprehensive testing of krafink social networking MVP. All core social features are working correctly including authentication, post creation, feed display, likes, comments, and basic navigation.
passed_tests: Feed display showing posts with author information
Like functionality (like/unlike toggle with count updates)
Real-time UI updates for likes and comments
Proper error handling and user feedback
action_item_for_E1: No critical issues found. All core social networking features are working correctly. The krafink MVP is ready for use.
